ygData.subject: Re: Throwing in a Monk Wrench...
ygData.msgSnippet: I have heard that there is a way to recieve head bands in addition to sashes for monks.  I was told you must go to queynos and get it there. so if there are
ygData.messageBody:
I have heard that there is a way to recieve head bands in addition to sashes
for monks. I was told you must go to queynos and get it there.
so if there are monks there, they may train you...

Garan lvl 6 monk [E'Ci]
Nafertina lvl 4 necro [Tunare]

>From: "Jannus Malus" <jannus_@...>
>
>Well, I'm a monk, 7th level, and I accidentally killed a Monk NPC
>(forgot to hit enter before talking, you've all been there probably).
>Now all the monk guilds hate me, and will not train me. So two
>questions:
>
>How can I get back on the good side of my guild?
>and
>Where can I train in the meantime?
>Get Your Private, Free Email at http://www.hotmail.com
